name: R5V20257ForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.Hl7VSNatureOfChallenge for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0257|2.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
value set `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0257|2.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.
